page.title: 13A Nursery Unit in Aycliffe
page.content: {Sugar Hill Nursery Unit}opened in Oct. 1981,to cater for 80 half-time pupils of pre-school age. Part of the Infant School had been lavishly converted to provide a spacious and stimulating environment for children aged 3 to 4\ years old.{Two}teachers and three nursery nurses are responsible to the primary school headteacher for the day to day organisation of activities and future development.The unit aims to prepare children for school within an environment where controlled,free, imaginative and social play allow,and foster the development of language and concepts.{The}unit also caters for pupils with special educational needs and currently includes a boy with no speech and delayed intellectual development,a deaf boy due to transfer to a special school for the deaf and a Chinese girl with no English.
